data.name: Low Rate Visa Credit Card
data.description: A Visa Credit Card with our lowest interest rate.

features.additionalInfo: Notifications can be enabled in the App or through Internet Banking, allowing you to be alerted either by email, sms or through the App about your card/account activity.
Leave your wallet behind and pay for the things you need with Samsung Pay.

For greater convenience and flexibility you can share you Bank Australia credit card with 1 additional card holder provided they are at least 18 years old. The card will be in their name but you will remain responsible for the account.
With Bpay View, you can see and pay your bills through Internet Banking.
You can self-serve your day-to-day banking needs via Bank Australia's App, Internet Banking or Phone Banking.

Use instore, online and withdraw local currency at millions of locations, everywhere Visa is accepted. Cards are enabled to support diverse needs with raised bumps on the left hand-side on the front face of the card.

Decide the features you want enabled on your card including card lock, digital wallet, pay wave, international transactions, ATM withdrawals or online/instore transactions and simply switch them on or off from your App or Internet Banking.
With PayID you can forget your BSB and account number – simply use your mobile, email or ABN to receive payments. This account can be linked to a PayID.
Leave your wallet behind and pay for the things you need with Apple Pay.

When you make a transaction with your Visa debit card, you can decide whether you want the amount to be rounded to the nearest whole dollar amount, with the round up being credited from your transaction account into your nominated Savings account or Credit Card. This account can receive Round Up credits.
There is no limit to the number of VISA transactions you can make.
Leave your wallet behind and pay for the things you need with Google Pay.

constraints.additionalInfo: Minimum Credit Limit of $1000 is required

eligibility.additionalValue: Natural Person or In trust for a Natural Person or Non-Individual entity
Available to citizens or permanent resident of Australia and valid Visa holders. Make sure you are currently in receipt of a regular income.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Each application for credit is subject to our normal lending criteria and approval.

fees.name: Foreign Currency Conversion fee
fees.additionalInfo:
We charge 3% of the value when you make a transaction that is converted by Visa from a foreign currency to Australian dollars and includes purchases made, overseas, in a currency other than Australian dollars, where the merchant is located overseas; or
where the financial institution or entity processing the transaction is located overseas.

fees.name: Exceeding available funds fee
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged on accounts when your balance falls below zero or your negative balance exceeds any agreed overdraft limit. Additional interest is charged on overdrawn amounts.

fees.name: Cash Advance Fee - Domestic
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged to any cash advance within Australia through all channels

fees.name: Delivery fee for an urgent replacement of lost, stolen or damaged Visa card in Australia
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged when you need an emergency replacement card or cash delivered to you on an urgent basis to an Australian address.

fees.name: Cash Advance Fee – Overseas
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to any cash advance made outside Australia, $3.50 plus Foreign Currency Conversion Fee is applicable.

fees.name: Annual Fee
fees.additionalInfo: An annual fee charged on your credit card.

fees.name: Visa emergency card/cash overseas fee
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged when you need an emergency replacement card or cash delivered to you on an urgent basis to an address overseas.

fees.name: Dishonour fee
fees.additionalInfo: When we dishonour a cheque or debit presented to us because there isn't enough money in your account
